attributes.action: Build more housing that is adapted for the disabled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick and tired of my local council telling me they have better things to spend their money on,  I have a 5 year old daughter who has Cerebral Palsy and is unable to walk unaided.  Therefore I have to carry her up and down the stairs as we do not have a downstairs bathroom.  I'm sure many other familes in the UK are in the same situation, where their houses are dangerous for the occupants.
